dao

Interface CouponDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouponDBDAO

    public interface CouponDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void createCoupon(long CompanyId, Coupon coupon) 
      List<Coupon> getAllCoupons() 
      List<Coupon> getAllCouponsCompany(long CompanyId)

      In case of identical information, the update will proceed and no errors will be thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        void createCoupon(long CompanyId,
                  Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        CompanyId - the id of the company on which the coupon will be registered.
        coupon - bean which holds the information needed to create the coupon.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if no such company exists, coupon already exists, or communication IO failed.

      • removeCoupon

        void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        coupon - bean which holds the information needed to remove the coupon.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if coupon does not exist, or communication IO failed.

      • updateCoupon

        void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        In case of identical information, the update will proceed and no errors will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        coupon - bean which holds the information of the update.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if coupon does not exist, or communication IO failed.

      • isTitleExists

        boolean isTitleExists(String title)
               throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        title - of the coupon.
        Returns:
        true if such title exists; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if communication IO failed.

      • getCoupon

        Coupon getCoupon(long id)
          throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        id - number of the coupon that will be returned if exists in the system.
        Returns:
        Coupon bean that holds the information about the coupon with the requested id number.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if no such coupon with specified Id exists or if communication IO failed.

      • getCouponByTitle

        Coupon getCouponByTitle(String title)
                 throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        title - of the coupon that will be returned if exists in the system.
        Returns:
        Coupon bean that holds the information about the coupon with the requested title.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if coupon title doesn't exist, or if communication IO failed.

      • getAllCoupons

        List<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
                    throws CouponSystemException
        Returns:
        A List that holds all the coupons.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there are no coupons in the system or communication IO failed.

      • getAllCouponsCompany

        List<Coupon> getAllCouponsCompany(long CompanyId)
                           throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        CompanyId - the Id number of the company which coupons will be returned.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons owned by the company with the specified Id.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no company with the specified Id, if there are no coupons owned by the company with the specified Id, or communication IO failed.

      • getCouponsCompanyByType

        List<Coupon> getCouponsCompanyByType(long CompanyId,
                                     CouponType type)
                              throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        CompanyId - the Id number of the company which coupons will be returned.
        type - the coupon type (which is an Enum - CouponType) of the coupon.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons owned by the company with the specified Id and are of the specified CouponType.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no company with the specified Id, if there are no coupons of the type (CouponType) requested, owned by the company with the specified Id, or communication IO failed.

      • getCouponsCompanyByPrice

        List<Coupon> getCouponsCompanyByPrice(long companyId,
                                      double price)
                               throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        companyId - the Id number of the company which coupons will be returned.
        price - the maximum price of the coupons.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons owned by the company with the specified Id which price is lower or equal to the specified price.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no company with the specified Id, if there are no coupons lower or equal to the specified price, or communication IO failed.

      • getCouponsCompanyByDate

        List<Coupon> getCouponsCompanyByDate(long id,
                                     Date date)
                              throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        id - number of the company which coupons will be returned.
        date - the latest end date of the coupons.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons owned by the company with the specified Id which end date is earlier or the same as the specified date.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no company with the specified Id, if there are no coupons which end date is earlier or the same as the specified date, or communication IO failed.

      • getAllpurchasedCoupons

        List<Coupon> getAllpurchasedCoupons(long customerId)
                             throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Id of the customer which coupons will be returned.
        Returns:
        A list of all the coupons that the customer purchased.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no customer with the specified Id, if no such coupons exist, or communication IO failed.

      • getAllpurchasedCouponByType

        List<Coupon> getAllpurchasedCouponByType(long customerId,
                                         CouponType type)
                                  throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Id of the customer which coupons will be returned.
        type - the coupon type (which is an Enum - CouponType) of the coupon.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons purchased by the customer with the specified Id and are of the specified CouponType.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no customer with the specified Id, if there are no coupons of the type (CouponType) requested, purchased by the customer with the specified Id, or communication IO failed.

      • getAllpurchasedCouponByPrice

        List<Coupon> getAllpurchasedCouponByPrice(long customerId,
                                          double price)
                                   throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Id of the customer which coupons will be returned.
        price - the maximum price of the coupons.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons purchased by the customer with the specified Id which price is lower or equal to the specified price.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no customer with the specified Id, if there are no coupons lower or equal to the specified price, or communication IO failed.

      • getAllPurchacedCouponByDate

        List<Coupon> getAllPurchacedCouponByDate(long customerId,
                                         Date date)
                                  throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Id of the customer which coupons will be returned.
        date - the latest end date of the coupons.
        Returns:
        A list that holds all the coupons purchased by the customer with the specified Id which end date is earlier or the same as the specified date.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there's no customer with the specified Id, if there are no coupons which end date is earlier or the same as the specified date, or communication IO failed.
